definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

pinyin: xiao1 shou4 shi2 dian3 qing2 bao4 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Sales of a variety of consumer-related products are gaining steadily.
sentences.chinese: 各种消费食品的销售在稳步上升。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 发行人已授权转包及销售此产品给方园集团的转包商。

sentences.english: Full-page newspaper ads hawk the fast-selling J3 hatchback.
sentences.chinese: 整版报纸广告都在报道J3的销售。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服装店当店员，负责销售。

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易条件与101号销售确认书中的规定相同。

sentences.english: Have reached a shopping direction, sales and customers purchase contract signed.
sentences.chinese: 已达成购物方向后，销售人员和客户签署购销合同。

sentences.english: Glaxo To Cut US Sales Reps For Avandia?
sentences.chinese: 葛兰素可能削减美国的文迪雅销售代表？

sentences.english: Kaifeng City is the only one strong sales of the quality of the machine tools company.
sentences.chinese: 是开封市唯一一家销售质量过硬的机械工具的公司。

sentences.english: But these are products that Oracle sells.
sentences.chinese: 但这些都是甲骨文公司销售的产品。

sentences.english: February was definitely not a good month for the automobile industry in America.
sentences.chinese: 二月份铁定是美国汽车工业销售惨淡的一个月。

sentences.english: That’s your big sales innovation? Sheesh.
sentences.chinese: 那就是你们重要的销售创新？

sentences.english: The specific methods for calculating net selling amount and Royalty are detailed in Appendix3 to the Contract.
sentences.chinese: 净销售额和提成费的具体计算方法详见本合同附件三。

sentences.english: Weston now demanded all profits from these sales go entirely to the investors.
sentences.chinese: 威斯顿如今却要求所有销售的利润均归投资者。

sentences.english: To reverse the " decline " in sales of Sable, and Mercury are also great to cut costs.
sentences.chinese: 扭转销售下降的紫貂，水星也主要成本削减。

sentences.english: Do you happen to know Mr. Johnson in the Marketing Department?
sentences.chinese: 宫先生是销售和市场部主管。

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
